txt.en: Speak with Thórvilon near the edge of Vartúlin.
'We must make haste to let Thórvilon know the good news!'
Use Cúridwan's salve to heal areas afflicted with the Lâg Dávrit, the Pale Blight around Vartúlin.
Speak with Usakâr to return to Vartúlin.
Use Cúridwan's salve to heal areas around Vartúlin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Used Cúridwan's salve to heal areas around Vartúlin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Thank you for everything you've done. We still have so much to do, but now we have hope because of you.

'You are welcome to come to Vartúlin and sit in our shade any season, my friend. Though there is still much to do, I am buoyed that the winds are turning and the emerald leaves will be returning to Favrathór. I wish so much that Milingor was here to see this. I - I wish so much. But thank you, truly, for all you've done for us.

'Avadhril would have your help, if you wish to further aid us.'
With the salve applied to the waters that run into Vartúlin, Usakâr urges you to return there quickly, to tell Thórvilon and the other Kintai the good news.
'Come, we must return quickly to Vartúlin to let Thórvilon know!'
Salves for a Ravaged Land, Part 5
Speak with Thórvilon near the front of Vartúlin
Speak with Usakâr when you are ready to go

'Thank you for everything you've done. We still have so much to do, but now we have hope because of you.
